body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Nathan Jenkins and the customer's name is Theresa Collins.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Nathan Jenkins, and I'm with Phat Hogs, your premier motorcycle dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Theresa! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with choosing the right motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. There are so many options available. Can I start by taking down a few details? What's your favorite riding style?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I prefer cruising on the weekends.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds fantastic! And may I also ask for your date of birth, Theresa, just to help us with personalized recommendations?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure! It's July fourteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! Lastly, could you please provide your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one zero two zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Theresa! We have some great models that would suit your cruising style perfectly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Theresa! If you have any more questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
